--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Northlight" <domnijoeproductions2001@y...> wrote:
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> > :::Torca:::
> > 
> > ::He looks up::
> > Torca: Whoa.  What is that?
> 
> ::REDHOT::
> 
>     With a groan and much heaving, Redhot came to peek over 
> Firedrill's roof. He noticed the fire in the sky and sneered.
>     "Paaa..." he snorted. "Something's up... to no good." He weakly 
> climbed out of Firedrill to join the others in their observation of 
> the sky. It was possible that the flame was a simple meteor, but 
were 
> they not very rare? He grunted. He didn't trust the situation. Even 
> more so, concidering his condition.
>     "Is...the..trajectory correct..for a meteor?" he asked 
Beachcomber 
> after a momment digesting his own thoughts. His voice was awash with 
> wary concern.

******************
::REDHOT::

    Redhot continued staring into the sky. The object COULD be a 
ship...it COULD be some peace of junk left in the sky and now it 
decided to re-enter the atmosphere, or it COULD be a meteor.
    "Maybe I'm just overreacting" he said to Beachcomber. He shrugged.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
*********************
